column2: IDEA-208615: Fix one of UiNotifyConnector leak channels

column3: Introduce disposables corresponding to individual tabs. Use such a disposable to control lifecycle of UiNotifyConnector used by EditorTabbedContainer.CloseTab.
This pull request is superseded by commit 42beaa8 IDEA-197682 Shadow action is created with the wrong lifetime spec (Disposable).
IDEA-208615: Fix one of UiNotifyConnector leak channels
